Model.GameObjects.Physics

Interface Body

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CircleBody, RectangleBody

    public interface Body
    Interface allowing the body instances to interact with each other.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • distance

        float distance(Body body)
        Calculates the outer distance from this body to another body
        Parameters:
        body - the other body
        Returns:
        the distance between nearest edge of the two bodies.

      • distance

        float distance(float xPos,
               float yPos)
        Calculates the outer distance from this body to a given point.
        Parameters:
        xPos - the X position to check from.
        yPos - the Y position to check from.
        Returns:
        the distance between nearest edge and the point.
